bit - package bit
 
BitTransform - Class in bit
BitTransform class contains static methods to transform one or an array of integer number(s) to boolean value(s) and vice-versa
BitTransform() - Constructor for class bit.BitTransform
 
BitTransformException - Exception in bit
Represents any exception occurred in the methods of the class BitTransform
BitTransformException(String) - Constructor for exception bit.BitTransformException
Public constructor which takes a error message as a parameter.
boolArrToIntArr(boolean[]) - Static method in class bit.BitTransform
Converts a boolean array to its equivalent integer array.
boolToInt(boolean) - Static method in class bit.BitTransform
Converts boolean to integer
